title: Aeroelectrolyte for atmospheric open electrochemical cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01252F, Communication
Yeji Lim, Yoon Jeong Yoo, Boran Kim, Suji Kim, Ga Yoon Kim, Won-Hee Ryu
We propose an open-structured electrochemical cell system as a new form factor featuring an “aeroelectrolyte” that floats in the air and directly engages with the electrode surfaces.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
